Tweet:
@ZaayaTweets silly comments will get you an instant block. 
You have 5 minutes to delete this tweet before we send you to trash.

Pakistan has experimented with this corrupt parliamentary democracy & all 3 parties have had their share & failed. 

Do you think it is time to change the system to Presidential model.. 

OR

Should we continue with same rotten parliamentary system.

This is the moment for IK now. 
DO NOT go into the next elections. In fact, block them till a referendum is done in the country to change the parliamentary democracy into a Presidential one with a completely new model where MNAs do not have any financial incentive to serve.

Many PTI members are suggesting that in next elections IK can get 2/3 majority. 
I do not see this happening without active political engineering by ISI. Since, ISI will not do that, the next parliament will also be identical to the present dissolved one - utter chaos & confusion

If the Constitution does not provide the remedy to the crime of treason within pol parties, then we need a new Constitution, a new system of governance where hostile powers cannot bring about regime change at will. 
 
If the SC does not deliver, then shut it down too. 

Enough!!!

All the suspects on the Regime change plot must be put on Exit control list. Once the noose tightens around their necks, they will all try to escape. 

The state of Pak, Army, ISI & SC are on trial here. They cannot blunder or be negligent in defending the land & the people.

Pak army & ISI must NEVER miss this opportunity. 
You can stay neutral politically, BUT you cannot stay neutral when the enemy attacks the country or buys traitors to demolish the state & the Govt. 
For far too long the State of Pakistan have been soft on internal enemies. Enuf!

The SC is hearing the Regime change conspiracy case now. This is the most brilliant God given opportunity for Army, ISI & IK to bring all the evidence to totally destroy all political traitors for all times. 
This is another "Agartala Sazish" or "MemoGate". 
Nail them!

#surprise

Note the date of this tweet..

The American regime change plan succeeded with only few million dollars used to purchase treacherous National assembly members and the entire system collapsed. https://t.co/dK222TMemZ
